title: CRS Directive – Platform Safety Bulletin 2025-01
content: Mandatory peak-hour crowd management SOP, signage updates, and acknowledgement workflow for station controllers.
author: Commissioner of Metro Rail Safety
aiSummary: Implement SOP and signage within 7 days; log acknowledgements; attach evidence for audit.

title: PO 23-9014 – Axle Bearing Assembly (SKF)
content: Design change note may impact current PO; coordinate with Rolling Stock Engineering to avoid duplicate ordering.
author: Procurement Cell
aiSummary: Cross-check bearing spec v3.1; hold dispatch until Engineering confirms compatibility.

title: റാത്രികാല SOP അപ്ഡേറ്റ് (Malayalam) / Night Shift SOP Update
content: ട്രാക്ക്-സൈഡ് പ്രവർത്തനങ്ങൾക്ക് പുതുക്കിയ SOP; isolation നടപടിക്രമങ്ങൾ, PPE ചാക്ക്ലിസ്റ്റ്, റേഡിയോ പ്രോട്ടോക്കോൾ…
author: Mr. Mohan Das
aiSummary: Night shift isolation, tool-box talk before deployment; bilingual briefing recommended.

title: Track Inspection Report – Aluva to Pulinchodu – Feb 2025
content: Ultrasonic rail flaw detection; minor squats at km 12.4; propose grinding schedule and monitoring.
author: Permanent Way
aiSummary: Schedule grinding for km 12.4; monitor post‑maintenance; no immediate speed restriction.

title: Infra Upgrade Design Change – Axle Bearing Spec v3.1
content: Engineering design update affecting rolling stock spare-parts procurement; backward compatibility notes and vendor impacts…
author: Rolling Stock Engineering
aiSummary: Design change likely impacts current procurement cycle; coordinate with Procurement to avoid duplicate orders.

title: രണ്ടുഭാഷാ സുരക്ഷാ അറിയിപ്പ് / Bilingual Safety Notice
content: ട്രാക്ക്-സൈഡ് പ്രവർത്തനങ്ങൾക്ക് പുതുക്കിയ SOP. Updated SOP for track-side work including night shifts and isolation procedures…
author: Safety Cell
aiSummary: Malayalam-English circular with actionable SOP changes for field teams; schedule toolbox talks before implementation.
